‚ÄúWhen powerful billionaires treat history as malleable simply because outcomes don‚Äôt align with their beliefs, we‚Äôre no longer dealing with innovation ‚Äî we‚Äôre facing narrative control,‚Äù he added. ‚ÄúRewriting training data to match ideology is wrong on every conceivable level.‚Äù
